name: Down Under (TheAppleCake)
description:
This planet has been ravaged by a nuclear war and there’s nothing good left on the surface ! This is why you are being sent on a mission to dig as deep as possible and bring back everything you can ! But be careful ! Your suit has a limited life support device and if you run out of energy, we will have to drag you back to the surface !

Between each run you will be able to use the gathered resources to upgrade your tools so you can reach deeper stratums, so don’t rush it !

Controls
  • WASD // Arrows - Move, aim
  • Space - Dig
  • R - Extract and start a new run
Credits

Music : Rhodesia MKII by Twin Musicom (twinmusicom.org)

Sounds made in Bfxr 

A game by Simon Branstett, please do not redistribute .

Special thanks to my friends for their support. Special shoutout to Thibaut !

Changelogs

1.2 - Postjam bug fixes/corrections

  • Added a quit button in the main menu
  • Added a reset button in the main menu to clear the data and start a new game
  • Added a button to go back to the main menu in the shop
  • Fixed a bug where the world generation would stop after 1000m under the surface
